about:
Hi! I am **Ashhar**, a passionate Computer Engineer with a solid foundation in software development, and cutting-edge technologies


I am eager to leverage hands-on experience gained through coursework, internships, Full time jobs and personal projects to drive innovative solutions in the ever-evolving tech landscape. Proficient in Website Development, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Excited to embark on opputunities where I can apply my knowledge and dedication to make a meaningful impact in the realm of technology and engineering.
